description:
This is the tenth and last class in the World Religions Class series. In this lesson we will be discussing the beliefs of the Jehovah's Witnesses. We will walk you through many of their various beliefs in this comprehensive course. You will learn many things including:

  • What they believe about God
  • What they believe about Jesus
  • What they believe about salvation
  • How they interpret the Bible

We hope that after this lesson you will have the knowledge you need to understand the beliefs of the Jehovah's Witnesses. We hope that it will inspire you to further explore the beliefs of world Religions.
title: 210 - Beliefs of the Jehovah's Witnesses
